title: Mercenary

fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Word of Mouth: All Chaos and Outsider Destructive will know you exist. You are able to send anonymous messages to them, and they may send messages to you. This will persist the entire game.
- Money-Driven: You must complete 2 tasks the Chaos and Destructives send you. It must be a game related task, and cannot span more than 6 consecutive phases. The Host will reject any obviously unreasonable requests.
- Well Equipped: You have a hand size of 6.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Redraw: Discard and redraw cards equal to the amount you have on hand. [2 uses, 1 CD]
- Preparations: Gain a non-special card of your choice. [4 uses, 1 CD]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Complete 2 tasks sent by Chaos and Outsider Destructive roles.

desc: *When you get a task from a Chaos/Outsider, you may choose to accept it. You cannot drop a task once you have accepted it. You may only have 2 tasks active at once. You must obtain both of your tasks before R3 Night ends, or else you will lose.*
